name: Alo Yoga Shoes Studio-To-Street Drop
reason: Product launch coverage (gigwise) shows studio-to-street positioning but lacks retailer-level evidence that stores are being repurposed as content properties; strength or operational detail below gate.

name: H&M Pre-Loved And Growth Officer Moves
reason: InStoreMag reporting on resale and org hires is relevant to experiential positioning but does not directly demonstrate store-as-studio programming in the US within the time window; moved to appendix for weaker direct signal.
